conclusion: Analyze the path of the liquid from each opening (A, B, C, and D) to see where it leads.
Liquid from opening A will hit the yellow baffle first.
Yellow baffle directs liquid towards the right.
Liquid hits the pink baffle.
Pink baffle directs liquid towards the left.
Liquid hits the gray baffle.
Gray baffle directs liquid towards the right.
Liquid hits the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle directs liquid towards the left, leading it into container E.
Liquid from opening B will hit the orange baffle first.
Orange baffle directs liquid towards the left.
Liquid hits the pink baffle.
Pink baffle directs liquid further towards the left.
Liquid hits the gray baffle.
Gray baffle directs liquid towards the right.
Liquid hits the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle directs liquid towards the left, leading it into container E.
Liquid from opening C will hit the orange baffle first.
Orange baffle directs liquid towards the left.
Liquid hits the pink baffle.
Pink baffle directs liquid further towards the left.
Liquid hits the gray baffle.
Gray baffle directs liquid towards the right.
Liquid hits the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle directs liquid towards the left, leading it into container E.
Liquid from opening D will hit the blue baffle first.
Blue baffle directs liquid towards the left.
